attributes.action: Supply MP's with accomodation whilst they are in parliament so the taxpayer need not have to pay for their second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Build or convert a large block of flats near the palace of  Westminster and make them live there during the time that Parliament is sitting. This will do away with the need for the tax payer to fund their mortgages on second homes, building improvements and increase their overall wealth, as it is never recovered when they cease being MP's. Those who have purchased second homes with mortgages funded by the tax payer can then sell the properties and repay the public purse.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
